title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 804.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 804.1 - Application

State Regulations

An employer may file a petition for modification of the
abatement date when compliance with the abatement requirements of a notice of
violation and order to comply have not been completed due to factors beyond its
reasonable control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
804.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
